PATIENT_ID: TEST_INTUB_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-18 03:00:00
Patient required emergent intubation for respiratory distress.
Intubated for hypoxia and increased work of breathing.
Endotracheal tube placed by anesthesia.
Intubation during hospitalization for acute decompensation.

[PROCEDURE] 2026-01-18 03:15:00
Endotracheal intubation performed.
ETT placed, confirmed by end-tidal CO2 and chest X-ray.
Intubation during stay for respiratory failure.
